title: "Can plants fool artificial intelligence? Using machine learning to compare between bee orchids and bees."
excerpt: "Bee orchids have long been an excellent example of how dishonest signal works in plant-animal interaction. Many studies compared the flower structures that resemble female bees, leading toward pseudo-copulation of the male bees on the flower."
